content: cabin dishcloth design by sandy nordwall eggers yarn any 100% cotton yarn i used crafter s secret cotton in taupe ivory and yellow hook 5mm/h hook supplies jute for tying up your bundle of dishcloths stitches chain= chain single_crochet= single_crochet half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet slip_stitch= slip_stitch f/o= finish off r1 chain 25 single_crochet in second chain from hook half_double_crochet * single_crochet half_double_crochet * repeat from *to* the end turn 24 r2 ch1 single_crochet in same st half_double_crochet * single_crochet half_double_crochet * repeat from *to* across turn 24 repeat r2 until the dishcloth is square edging r1 ch1 single_crochet across single_crochet ch1 single_crochet in corner stitch repeat around slip_stitch to join r2 ch1 repeat r1 slip_stitch to join f/o weave in the ends to give the dishcloths as a gift i tied a piece of jute around the 3 dishcloths and made a bow on top easy peasy 😊 thank you and happy crocheting you can find more of my patterns on ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/sandy-nordwall-eggers all rights reserved by sandy nordwall eggers
